attrs.script:
#script

prism_ip = '@@{PC_IP}@@'
username = '@@{PC_USER}@@'
password = '@@{PC_PASSWORD}@@'
app_name = '@@{APPLICATION_NAME}@@'
action_name = "UnregisterFromLB"
application_uuid = ""
action_runlog_id = ""
application_vm_names = []
api_url = "https://" + prism_ip + ":9440/api/nutanix/v3"

print "INFO: Retrieving application list of given application names: {}.".format(app_name)

# -*- Get Application list UUID

get_apps_uuid_url = api_url + "/apps/list" 
filter_query = "_state==running;name==" + app_name
payload = {
        "filter": filter_query
    }
headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
try:
    response = urlreq(get_apps_uuid_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
    apps_content = json.loads(response.content)
    application_uuid = apps_content['entities'][0]['metadata']['uuid']
except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get application '{}' is not in running state or doesn't exists. Please check username/password too.".format(app_name)
    print e.message

if  application_uuid == "":
    print "WARNING: No applications found with given name: {}.".format(app_name)
    exit(1)

# -*- Launch application action 
launch_apps_action_url = api_url + "/apps/{}/actions/run".format(application_uuid)

payload = {
        "name": action_name
    }
headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
try:
    response = urlreq(launch_apps_action_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
    action_run_content = json.loads(response.content)
    action_runlog_id = action_run_content['runlog_uuid']
except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Failed to run application action: {}".format(action_name)
    print e.message
    exit(1)
print "INFO: Running Action '{}' for application id: '{}' runlog id: '{}'".format(action_name, application_uuid, action_runlog_id)

while True:
    print "INFO: Checking run log: {}".format(action_runlog_id)
    runlog_status_url = api_url + "/apps/{}/app_runlogs/{}".format(application_uuid,action_runlog_id)
    response = urlreq(runlog_status_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
    poll_runlog_content = json.loads(response.content)
    if poll_runlog_content['status']['state'] == 'SUCCESS':
        print "INFO: Action {} is sucessful for application id: {}.".format(action_name,application_uuid)
        break
    elif poll_runlog_content['status']['state'] == 'RUNNING' or poll_runlog_content['status']['state'] == 'PENDING':
        print "INFO: Action {} is in progress for application id: {}.".format(action_name,application_uuid)
    else:
        print "ERROR: Action {} for application id: {} failed.".format(action_name,application_uuid)
        break
    sleep(5)

#script

prism_ip = '@@{PC_IP}@@'
username = '@@{PC_USER}@@'
password = '@@{PC_PASSWORD}@@'
app_name = '@@{APPLICATION_NAME}@@'
action_name = "action_stop"
application_uuid = ""
action_runlog_id = ""
application_vm_names = []
application_vm_ips = []
api_url = "https://" + prism_ip + ":9440/api/nutanix/v3"

print "INFO: Retrieving application list of given application names: {}.".format(app_name)

# -*- Get Application list UUID

get_apps_uuid_url = api_url + "/apps/list" 
filter_query = "_state==running;name==" + app_name
payload = {
        "filter": filter_query
    }
headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
try:
    response = urlreq(get_apps_uuid_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
    apps_content = json.loads(response.content)
    application_uuid = apps_content['entities'][0]['metadata']['uuid']
except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get application '{}' is not in running state or doesn't exists. Please check username/password too.".format(app_name)
    print e.message

if  application_uuid == "":
    print "WARNING: No applications found with given name: {}.".format(app_name)
    exit(1)

# -*- Launch application action 
launch_apps_action_url = api_url + "/apps/{}/actions/run".format(application_uuid)

payload = {
        "name": action_name
    }
headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
try:
    response = urlreq(launch_apps_action_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
    action_run_content = json.loads(response.content)
    action_runlog_id = action_run_content['runlog_uuid']
except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Failed to run application action: {}".format(action_name)
    print e.message
    exit(1)
print "INFO: Running Action '{}' for application id: '{}' runlog id: '{}'".format(action_name, application_uuid, action_runlog_id)


while True:
    print "INFO: Checking run log: {}".format(action_runlog_id)
    runlog_status_url = api_url + "/apps/{}/app_runlogs/{}".format(application_uuid,action_runlog_id)
    response = urlreq(runlog_status_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
    poll_runlog_content = json.loads(response.content)
    if poll_runlog_content['status']['state'] == 'SUCCESS':
        print "INFO: Action {} is sucessful for application id: {}.".format(action_name,application_uuid)
        break
    elif poll_runlog_content['status']['state'] == 'RUNNING' or poll_runlog_content['status']['state'] == 'PENDING':
        print "INFO: Action {} is in progress for application id: {}.".format(action_name,application_uuid)
    else:
        print "ERROR: Action {} for application id: {} failed.".format(action_name,application_uuid)
        break
    sleep(5)

#Get Application
get_app_data = api_url + "/apps/{}".format(application_uuid)
try:
    response = urlreq(get_app_data, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
    app_content = json.loads(response.content)
    for deployment_list in app_content['status']['resources']['deployment_list']:
        vm_name = deployment_list['substrate_configuration']['element_list'][0]['instance_name']
        vm_ip = deployment_list['substrate_configuration']['element_list'][0]['address']
        application_vm_names.append(vm_name)
        application_vm_ips.append(vm_ip)
except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get application vm names: {}".format(app_name)
    print e.message
    exit(1)

print "VM_NAMES={}".format(",".join(application_vm_names))
print "VM_IPS={}".format(",".join(application_vm_ips))

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

host="@@{EXECUTOR.VM_IPS[0]}@@"

echo "  server host-${host} ${host}:80 weight 1 maxconn 100 check" | sudo tee -a /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

sudo systemctl reload haproxy

#script

prism_ip = '@@{PC_IP}@@'
username = '@@{PC_USER}@@'
password = '@@{PC_PASSWORD}@@'
app_name = '@@{APPLICATION_NAME}@@'
application_uuid = ""
application_vm_names = []
application_vm_ips = []
api_url = "https://" + prism_ip + ":9440/api/nutanix/v3"

print "INFO: Retrieving application list of given application names: {}.".format(app_name)

# -*- Get Application list UUID

get_apps_uuid_url = api_url + "/apps/list" 
filter_query = "_state==stopped;name==" + app_name
payload = {
        "filter": filter_query
    }
headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
try:
    response = urlreq(get_apps_uuid_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
    apps_content = json.loads(response.content)
    application_uuid = apps_content['entities'][0]['metadata']['uuid']
except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get application '{}' is not in running state or doesn't exists. Please check username/password too.".format(app_name)
    print e.message

if  application_uuid == "":
    print "WARNING: No applications found with given name: {}.".format(app_name)
    exit(1)

#Get Application
get_app_data = api_url + "/apps/{}".format(application_uuid)
try:
    response = urlreq(get_app_data, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
    app_content = json.loads(response.content)
    for deployment_list in app_content['status']['resources']['deployment_list']:
        vm_name = deployment_list['substrate_configuration']['element_list'][0]['instance_name']
        vm_ip = deployment_list['substrate_configuration']['element_list'][0]['address']
        application_vm_names.append(vm_name)
        application_vm_ips.append(vm_ip)
except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get application vm names: {}".format(app_name)
    print e.message
    exit(1)

print "VM_NAMES={}".format(",".join(application_vm_names))
print "VM_IPS={}".format(",".join(application_vm_ips))

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

host="@@{EXECUTOR.VM_IPS[0]}@@"
if [[ ${host} == "" ]]; then 
  echo "Ip not found exit"
  exit 1
fi

sed -i "/${host}/d" /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

sudo systemctl reload haproxy

#script

prism_ip = '@@{PC_IP}@@'
username = '@@{PC_USER}@@'
password = '@@{PC_PASSWORD}@@'
app_name = '@@{APPLICATION_NAME}@@'
action_name = "action_start"
application_uuid = ""
action_runlog_id = ""
api_url = "https://" + prism_ip + ":9440/api/nutanix/v3"

print "INFO: Retrieving application list of given application names: {}.".format(app_name)

# -*- Get Application list UUID

get_apps_uuid_url = api_url + "/apps/list" 
filter_query = "_state==stopped;name==" + app_name
payload = {
        "filter": filter_query
    }
headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
try:
    response = urlreq(get_apps_uuid_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
    apps_content = json.loads(response.content)
    application_uuid = apps_content['entities'][0]['metadata']['uuid']
except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get application '{}' is not in running state or doesn't exists. Please check username/password too.".format(app_name)
    print e.message

if  application_uuid == "":
    print "WARNING: No applications found with given name: {}.".format(app_name)
    exit(1)

# -*- Launch application action 
launch_apps_action_url = api_url + "/apps/{}/actions/run".format(application_uuid)

payload = {
        "name": action_name
    }
headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
try:
    response = urlreq(launch_apps_action_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
    action_run_content = json.loads(response.content)
    action_runlog_id = action_run_content['runlog_uuid']
except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Failed to run application action: {}".format(action_name)
    print e.message
    exit(1)
print "INFO: Running Action '{}' for application id: '{}' runlog id: '{}'".format(action_name, application_uuid, action_runlog_id)


while True:
    print "INFO: Checking run log: {}".format(action_runlog_id)
    runlog_status_url = api_url + "/apps/{}/app_runlogs/{}".format(application_uuid,action_runlog_id)
    response = urlreq(runlog_status_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
    poll_runlog_content = json.loads(response.content)
    if poll_runlog_content['status']['state'] == 'SUCCESS':
        print "INFO: Action {} is sucessful for application id: {}.".format(action_name,application_uuid)
        break
    elif poll_runlog_content['status']['state'] == 'RUNNING' or poll_runlog_content['status']['state'] == 'PENDING':
        print "INFO: Action {} is in progress for application id: {}.".format(action_name,application_uuid)
    else:
        print "ERROR: Action {} for application id: {} failed.".format(action_name,application_uuid)
        break
    sleep(5)

action_name = "RegisterToLB"

action_list.description: System action for installing an application
action_list.name: action_install

attrs.script:
yum install -y python python-pip git
git clone https://github.com/vmware/pyvmomi-community-samples.git
cd pyvmomi-community-samples/
pip install -r requirements.txt

action_name = "action_stop"
application_uuid = ""
action_runlog_id = ""
application_vm_names = []
application_vm_ips = []
api_url = "https://" + prism_ip + ":9440/api/nutanix/v3"

print "INFO: Retrieving application list of given application names: {}.".format(app_name)

# -*- Get Application list UUID

get_apps_uuid_url = api_url + "/apps/list" 
filter_query = "_state==running;name==" + app_name
payload = {
        "filter": filter_query
    }
headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
try:
    response = urlreq(get_apps_uuid_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
    apps_content = json.loads(response.content)
    application_uuid = apps_content['entities'][0]['metadata']['uuid']
except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get application '{}' is not in running state or doesn't exists. Please check username/password too.".format(app_name)
    print e.message

if  application_uuid == "":
    print "WARNING: No applications found with given name: {}.".format(app_name)
    exit(1)

# -*- Launch application action 
launch_apps_action_url = api_url + "/apps/{}/actions/run".format(application_uuid)

payload = {
        "name": action_name
    }
headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
try:
    response = urlreq(launch_apps_action_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
    action_run_content = json.loads(response.content)
    action_runlog_id = action_run_content['runlog_uuid']
except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Failed to run application action: {}".format(action_name)
    print e.message
    exit(1)
print "INFO: Running Action '{}' for application id: '{}' runlog id: '{}'".format(action_name, application_uuid, action_runlog_id)


while True:
    print "INFO: Checking run log: {}".format(action_runlog_id)
    runlog_status_url = api_url + "/apps/{}/app_runlogs/{}".format(application_uuid,action_runlog_id)
    response = urlreq(runlog_status_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
    poll_runlog_content = json.loads(response.content)
    if poll_runlog_content['status']['state'] == 'SUCCESS':
        print "INFO: Action {} is sucessful for application id: {}.".format(action_name,application_uuid)
        break
    elif poll_runlog_content['status']['state'] == 'RUNNING' or poll_runlog_content['status']['state'] == 'PENDING':
        print "INFO: Action {} is in progress for application id: {}.".format(action_name,application_uuid)
    else:
        print "ERROR: Action {} for application id: {} failed.".format(action_name,application_uuid)
        break
    sleep(5)

#Get Application
get_app_data = api_url + "/apps/{}".format(application_uuid)
try:
    response = urlreq(get_app_data, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
    app_content = json.loads(response.content)
    for deployment_list in app_content['status']['resources']['deployment_list']:
        vm_name = deployment_list['substrate_configuration']['element_list'][0]['instance_name']
        vm_ip = deployment_list['substrate_configuration']['element_list'][0]['address']
        application_vm_names.append(vm_name)
        application_vm_ips.append(vm_ip)
except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get application vm names: {}".format(app_name)
    print e.message
    exit(1)

print "VM_NAMES={}".format(",".join(application_vm_names))
print "VM_IPS={}".format(",".join(application_vm_ips))

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

host="@@{EXECUTOR.VM_IPS[0]}@@"

echo "  server host-${host} ${host}:80 weight 1 maxconn 100 check" | sudo tee -a /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

sudo systemctl reload haproxy

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

host="@@{EXECUTOR.VM_IPS[0]}@@"
if [[ ${host} == "" ]]; then 
  echo "Ip not found exit"
  exit 1
fi

sed -i "/${host}/d" /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

sudo systemctl reload haproxy

#script

prism_ip = '@@{PC_IP}@@'
username = '@@{PC_USER}@@'
password = '@@{PC_PASSWORD}@@'
app_name = '@@{APPLICATION_NAME}@@'
application_uuid = ""
application_vm_names = []
application_vm_ips = []
api_url = "https://" + prism_ip + ":9440/api/nutanix/v3"

print "INFO: Retrieving application list of given application names: {}.".format(app_name)

# -*- Get Application list UUID

get_apps_uuid_url = api_url + "/apps/list" 
filter_query = "_state==stopped;name==" + app_name
payload = {
        "filter": filter_query
    }
headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
try:
    response = urlreq(get_apps_uuid_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
    apps_content = json.loads(response.content)
    application_uuid = apps_content['entities'][0]['metadata']['uuid']
except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get application '{}' is not in running state or doesn't exists. Please check username/password too.".format(app_name)
    print e.message

if  application_uuid == "":
    print "WARNING: No applications found with given name: {}.".format(app_name)
    exit(1)

#Get Application
get_app_data = api_url + "/apps/{}".format(application_uuid)
try:
    response = urlreq(get_app_data, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
    app_content = json.loads(response.content)
    for deployment_list in app_content['status']['resources']['deployment_list']:
        vm_name = deployment_list['substrate_configuration']['element_list'][0]['instance_name']
        vm_ip = deployment_list['substrate_configuration']['element_list'][0]['address']
        application_vm_names.append(vm_name)
        application_vm_ips.append(vm_ip)
except Exception as e:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get application vm names: {}".format(app_name)
    print e.message
    exit(1)

print "VM_NAMES={}".format(",".join(application_vm_names))
print "VM_IPS={}".format(",".join(application_vm_ips))

yum install -y python python-pip git

cd pyvmomi-community-samples/
pip install -r requirements.txt
